title: 93/37/EEC: Commission Decision of 18 December 1992 amending Decision 91/28/EEC authorizing certain Member States to provide for exceptions from certain provisions of Directive 77/93/EEC in respect of potatoes for human consumption originating in Turkey (Only the German, French and Dutch texts are authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 18 December 1992 amending Decision 91/28/EEC authorizing certain Member States to provide for exceptions from certain provisions of Directive 77/93/EEC in respect of potatoes for human consumption originating in Turkey (Only  the Dutch, French and German texts are authentic)
(93/37/EEC)THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Belgium, the Federal Republic of Germany, the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg and the Kingdom of the Netherlands.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 December 1992.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
